text: On 21 June 2023, there was an explosion in the Xingqing District of Yinchuan in China. 31 people were killed and 7 others were injured at the Fuyang Barbecue Restaurant. == References == Category:2023 disasters in Asia Category:2020s in China Category:2020s explosions in Asia Category:June 2023 events
title: 2023 Yinchuan gas explosion
